name: Eurofacts Oy
goal: Eurofacts Oy is an agency specialized in public affairs, regulatory affairs and communications with offices in Helsinki (Finland) and St. Petersburg (Russian Federation). Eurofacts is the affiliate of FleishmanHillard in Finland.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Energy, environment, climate, circular economy, financial services, telecoms, transport, defence, internal market and competition.
